entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 13.3°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
